features: 💖Warm Tips💖1. Please make sure the blade is installed correctly, otherwise the safety razor will not work properly. 2. Safety razors are different from cartridge razors, Please apply less pressure or no pressure when using them, use short and gentle strokes!!!

Packaging Upgrade and BULIMICA Services: You may receive products with old packaging while our upgrade is in progress. We are so confident in our products and we are happy to serve you for life. If you have any questions, please feel free to tell us, our customer service will provide a satisfactory solution for you!

10 Premium Razor Blades: The sharp platinum coated USA stainless steel blades for a long lasting, precise and clean shave. Each blade is individually wrapped in wax paper for safer handling. Each double edge razor blade can be used about 5-15 times.

Beginner Friendly: Our safety razors have a very simple design and blade replacement is very easy. With its unigue texturedgrip and comfortable weight, you can easily controland slide at a 30-degree angle for a smooth, close, clean shave without irritation or ingrown hairs.

Durable and Save Money: BULIMICA metal double edge safety razor is made of the Zinc Alloy materials, which is durable and will not rust. You can place it anywhere in the shower or bathroom and use it as often as you need!With proper care and maintenance, it can last a lifetime.

Perfect Gift: BULIMICA safety razors include an simple Blade Disposal Bag. You can put your used double edge blades inside for recycling. We spent a long time designing the razor packaging to make it eco friendly, zero waste and elegant. This would be a great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Newbies: make sure you screw the bottom right!
reviews.reviewText: I want to preface this by saying I've never used a safety razor before so I didn't know any better.At first, I thought this product was horrible. I'd barely shave anything at all whenever I did a pass. On the day I was going to return it, I noticed the product picture looked a bit different than mine. Then it hit me: I had the bottom part screwed in upside down lmaoo. I paired it with some Astra blades and it works like a dream now. I don't think I'll have to buy more for a few years now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good product
reviews.reviewText: I just shaved! The sharp razor blade is perfect, and the beard goes smoothly under the blade and its metallic sheath. I shaved faster and better, shaving is no longer a chore but a ritual know. I loved it! One of the best purchases I’ve done here.pd: don’t let the design fool you, I was shaving and couldn’t cut a single hair, then I realized I placed the bottom metallic plate wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unforgiving Learning Curve and Time Consuming
reviews.reviewText: Prior to using a double edge safety razor to shave my face, I'd used the one designed to allow oneself to shave their back. I was able to use the back shaver as if it were a back scratcher, minus the scratches & cuts. This "Double Edge Safety Razor" not so much.Watched a few videos to see if a DESR was worth a try, and I got the feeling it was. Shaving the sides of my face and neck line was straight forward, kinda. Get the angle a little off and you'll feel the burn shortly afterwards. Where the DESR fails me is along my jaw line, chin and upper lip. If I shave these areas where I don't cut/razor burn myself, then the shave isn't smooth. Which translates into an uneven 5 O'clock shadow. All this being careful to not cut myself translates into double the amount of time it would take to shave my face with a disposable multi-blade razor. Ain't nobody got time for dat!At least I'm not out a great deal of money in trying this setup. Which oddly enough my reason for wanting it to work was to save money on blades. For those of you that are saying that I got what I paid for, I disagree. Build quality aside, reviews from the least expensive to the most expensive all contain new user experiences where the DESR had them bleeding. Even after multiple tries.This razor has a solid build quality, but as other reviewers have shown, it is susceptible to breaking if it falls from counter height, or higher. The included blade seemed to dull rather quickly within the 5 times I used it. I removed the blade after each use, cleaning it with alcohol and allowing it to air dry. Once again, a lot of extra time that isn't as necessary with a disposable multi-blade setup.I'll keep at it on the days that I'm not pressed for time to see if I can improve upon the shave quality in the more difficult areas, and maybe get to my goal of saving money on blades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality and Disappointing Performance
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Matte Black Double Edge Safety Razor for Men, accompanied by 10 Platinum Coated Double Edge Safety Blades, with the expectation of a durable and reliable shaving experience. Unfortunately, my experience with this product has been nothing short of disappointing.Firstly, the matte black finish, which initially attracted me to the razor, turned out to be a major letdown. After just a few uses, the razor started showing signs of wear and chipping, making it look cheap and poorly constructed. The lack of durability in the finish is unacceptable, especially considering the premium appearance promised.Moreover, the functionality of the razor leaves much to be desired. The shaving process is far from smooth, with the blades causing discomfort and occasional nicks. I expected a superior performance from a product that claims to be a safety razor for men, but unfortunately, it falls short of even basic expectations.The 10 Platinum Coated Double Edge Safety Blades included in the package are equally disappointing. They dull much faster than anticipated, requiring frequent replacements. This not only diminishes the cost-effectiveness of the product but also adds to the inconvenience of having to switch blades so frequently.In summary, this purchase has been a regrettable one, and I feel compelled to express my dissatisfaction with the quality and performance of the Matte Black Double Edge Safety Razor. I would strongly advise against purchasing this product, as it does not deliver on its promises and fails to meet even the most basic standards for a shaving tool. Save your money and explore other options that provide better value for your investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It takes some getting used to.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using multi-blade razors for years. I decided to try this safety razor mostly due to blade cost.The first time I tried it on my legs i nicked myself in a dozen or so places before I called it quits.I tried again a week or so later, and paid more attention. The key is to use very light pressure and take it slowly. Although I still nicked myself a couple of times, I got a very smooth shave with a single pass. I suspect as I grow more accustomed to it the nicks will stop.Just remember -- the blade is *sharp*. That means it shaves almost effortlessly, but can easily cut you if you aren't careful. Take it easy and I think you'll be pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky, Smooth Skin
reviews.reviewText: This year, my focus is on reducing my plastic consumption and minimizing waste. While browsing online, I noticed a few people using this pretty pink razor and it struck me that this razor is significantly more sustainable than others on my market, and will last me a lifetime! Additionally, my skin is much smoother and I have no more razor pumps or ingrowns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine razor, but it broke seemingly for no reason
reviews.reviewText: I used to use those multi bladed razors. Then I went to simple BIC single blade disposables which worked fine.After some debate I decided to try this razor because it was cheap. It worked great. After a learning curve and a few cuts, I shave pretty fast. I like it most because where I used to have to shave everyday, I get such a close shave with this I only need to shave every other day.3 stars because it was hanging in my shower and randomly the part that screws into the head broke in half.Not sure why. Razor is sheep enough to buy it again, but if it breaks again I'm getting a different brand.
